newsitem.title: USA: LifeRate Systems doubling customer base.
newsitem.headline: LifeRate Systems doubling customer base.

text.p: LifeRate Systems Inc said Wednesday it signed four new contracts that will double the customer base for its proprietary clinical information systems.

The new contracts are with Central Cardiovascular Clinic in San Antonio, Texas; Allergy & Asthma Medical Group & Research Center in San Diego, Calif.; Aaronson Asthma & Allergy Associates Ltd in Chicago and Cardiovascular Consultants of Tacoma Park, Md. Financial terms were not disclosed.
LifeRite, which develops software for the health care industry, said it is also negotiating with eight additional cardiovascular and three allergy and asthma practice groups.
